level.text: By August 31st of each year, the Commission shall send each public utility, competitive electric supplier, competitive natural gas supplier, and CLEC separate Orders of Assessment for the Commission and the Office of the People’s Counsel.

Invoices shall be paid in full to the Treasurer of the District of Columbia within thirty (30) days of the date of receipt, except that all invoices shall be paid before the last day of the fiscal year.
